main.name: Ahsan Nazir
main.description: Full Stack React Developer by Day, Founder && Freelancer by Night.
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for network security, and a passion for coding. Now, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. HIRE ME!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.
main.message: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the     form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms. Graduated with Distinction

work.title: Frontend Developer / React Developer
work.description: Here I have had the chance to dig in and get my hands dirty with all parts of our software. I have worked with GraphQL. As well, I worked on a mobile application written in React Native. I have worked extensively with React as well as with react hooks.

work.title: Software Engineer && React Specialist
work.description: For most of my time at Algospark, I have worked as a Full Stack Software Engineer. Here I have had the chance to dig in and get my hands dirty with all parts of our software. I have worked with Apollo GraphQL, as well as built new node-based servers for new products. As well, I worked on a mobile application written in React Native. I have worked extensively with React as well as with react hooks.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Build many websites for local clients.

projects.title: Random Qoute Generator
projects.category: Displays random Quotes fetched from an API

projects.title: Space X Launches
projects.category: This app shows all SpaceX launch missions

testimonials.text: Working with Ahsan was better than expected and we had really high expectations. He is an incredibly talented developer but what really makes him stand out is his work ethic and steady approach. Time after time, and without us asking, he added enhancements and improvements that resulted in a better end product for us and our clients.

That Ahsan must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him right now. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be  have good  previous job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
